comments:
Build ID: M20070212-1330

Steps To Reproduce:
1. create a class like 

class Foo { 
  public static function define($arg1,$arg2) { 
    exit();
  }
}

2. On the page do <?php Foo::define('a','b'); ?>


More information:
This will send out an error with define, as define is already a base function although this is a class method, and also when highlighting it from left to right it works alright, but when you highlight the line from right to left it produces an eclipse error that says look at the error log.


The eclipse error log information i recieved was.
